item.title: The backlog of blogging ideas
item.description: Backlog of ideas https://rpubs.com/MLivingstone/CourseraInferentialStatsP1#:~:text=The%20exponential%20distribution%20is%20the,standard%20deviation%20of%201%2F%CE%BB. https://stats.libretexts.org/Bookshelves/Introductory_Statistics/Book%3A_Introductory_Statistics_(Shafer_and_Zhang)/06%3A_Sampling_Distributions/6.03%3A_The_Sample_Proportion Pytest: https://semaphoreci.com/community/tutorials/testing-python-applications-with-pytest Confidence intervals for hackers. Similar to this, but for hackers Having your cake and eating it, or better: building confidence Managed ML platforms, compared Qualita dell aria, altra api - https://www.eea.europa.eu/themes/air/explore-air-pollution-data Energia in generale 1 by sector, italy, use per person, primary and final in EU Other sources, wikipedia, world energy consumption by sector A simple at-home experiment: the Energetic signature GHG emissions by sector
